name: psssdm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cps), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(cdm(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c1))), c1))
bodyPretty: ⊢ ((c0 ∈ PosetRel ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)→ dom((c0 ⋂(c1 × c1)))= c1)

stmt.origin: sylan9eq(cdm(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c1))), c1, cin(c2, c1), wcel(c0, cps), wss(c1, c2))
stmt.pretty: sylan9eq(dom((c0 ⋂(c1 × c1))), c1, (c2 ⋂ c1), c0 ∈ PosetRel, c1 ⊆ c2)

-| wi(wss(c1, c2), wceq(cin(c2, c1), c1))

|- wi(wcel(c0, cps), wceq(cdm(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c1))), cin(c2, c1)))

body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ PosetRel → dom((c0 ⋂(c1 × c1)))=(c2 ⋂ c1))
⊣ c2 = dom(c0)
